metadata.name: Dua for entering the cemetary - I.  Ali

arabic: اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَى اَهْلِ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
مِنْ اَهْلِ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
يَا اَهْلِ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
كَيْفَ وَجَدْتُمْ قَوْلَ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
إِغْفِرْ لِمَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
وَحْشُرْنَا فِيْ زُمْرَةِ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
translation: Peace be upon people of "There is no god but Allah"
from the people of "There is no god but Allah"
O people of "There is no god but Allah"
for the sake of "There is no god but Allah"
How have you found the testimony of "There is no god but Allah"
From "There is no god but Allah"
O "There is no god but Allah"
I beseech You in the name of "There is no god but Allah"
to forgive anyone who professed "There is no god but Allah"
And gather us in the group of those who said: "There is no god but Allah"
Muhamad is the Messenger of Allah
Ali is the Wali of Allah
transliteration: as salāmu `alā ahli lā ilāha illallāh
kayfa wajadtum qawla lā ilāha illallāh
ighfir liman qāla lā ilāha illallāh
waḥshur-nā fī zumrati man qāla lā ilāha illallāh
